exec: /**validate that the response code is the one I am waiting for in the js for the current iteration*/
/**validate that the response message is the one I am expecting in the js for the current iteration*/
const unixTimestamp = new Date((pm.environment.get("pocDateTime")) * 1000); //multiply 1000 converts Unix  to JavaScript
/**I save the resulting values in the environment for later use in the CheckDocument service*/
const date = (getday + "/" + getMonth + "/" + unixTimestamp.getFullYear() + " " + getHours + ":" + getMin + ":" + getSec);
/**Verifying that the data sent in the body of the request are the same as those returned in the body of the response.*/
pm.test("validate that the response message is the one I am expecting in the js for the current iteration", () => {
/**If the passenger is inserted verify the data in insertBcbp*/
/**I keep the time when the passenger passed through poc*/
/**I specify the flight for 5:00 p.m. on the current day*/
const stda = Math.floor(new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth(), now.getDate(), 17, 0, 0, 0) / 1000.0);
/**Gets the Julian day of the current year*/
/**Change the stdaJul in the code2D of the json*/
